General.Name: Galata Wind Enerji Anonim Sirket
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Galata Wind Enerji A.S. operates and rents electric power plants in Turkey. It operates three wind power plants and two solar power plants with total capacity of 269 MW. The company was formerly known as GY Enerji Danismanlik Poje Mühendislik Üretim, Ticaret ve Sanayi Limited Sirketi and changed its name to Galata Wind Enerji A.S. in January 2012. Galata Wind Enerji A.S. was founded in 2006 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Galata Wind Enerji A.S. is a subsidiary of Dogan Enerji Yatirimlari Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
